alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 13 at 9:06PM PDT until March 14 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Strongest winds in the Interstate 5 corridor. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds and blowing dust will make driving difficult. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways impacted by the strong winds include Interstate 5. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
